notes: - Added character pictures next to the names in the initiative tracker

- Added a current player feature so you know whose turn it is
- Changed the structure of the front and backend
- Finalized the layout of each character
- Updated Change Log stlyes and backend html
- Added an initiative tracker with enemy support
- Changed the layout to better fit needs (still work in progress).
- Added automatic dark/light mode support based on your prefrences.
- Updated backend html to adapt to new elements.
